title: jeremypwr
author: jeremypwr
created_time: May 01, 2023, 05:57:09 PMLast edit: May 05, 2023, 04:17:04 PM by jeremypwr
content: UFC 288Multi Master Challenge   Prizes1st place: 2 mbtc Free Bet2nd place: 1 mbtc Free Bet3rd place: 0.5 mbtc Free BetThe Rules are similar to the original Sportsbet.io Multi Master that we all enjoyed so muchRulesa)  Predict the winner of each match (earn 1-2 points)b)  Predict how many matches will NOT go the Full Distance (will be adjusted accordingly if matches get cancelled)Odds @ https://sportsbet.io/sports/mma/ufc/ufc-288-sterling-vs-cejudo/matchesMatches(2 points each)14. Aljamain Sterling vs. Henry Cejudo 13. Belal Muhammad vs. Gilbert Burns12. Jessica Andrade vs. Yan Xiaonan11. 10. Kron Gracie vs. Charles Jourdain(1 point each)9. Drew Dober vs. Matt Frevola8. Kennedy Nzechukwu vs. Devin Clark7. Khaos Williams vs. Rolando Bedoya6. Marina Rodriguez vs. Virna Jandiroba5. Braxton Smith vs. Parker Porter4. Phil Hawes vs. Ikram Aliskerov3. 2. Joseph Holmes vs. Claudio Ribeiro1. NOT go the Full Distance  Make sure your Prediction is in this format  Example14. Aljamain Sterling 13. Belal Muhammad 12. Jessica Andrade 11. 10. Kron Gracie 9. Drew Dober 8. Kennedy Nzechukwu 7. Khaos Williams 6. Marina Rodriguez 5. Braxton Smith 4. Phil Hawes 3. 2. Joseph Holmes 1. NOT go the Full Distance 6(Small print)* Must be active in Sports betting and/or Sports betting discussion (some exceptions) *** The declared winners are final and up to my discretion **

comments.author: jeremypwr
comments.body: Sportsbet.io has been kind enough to sponsor my Prediction Contests and Promos for a while now.Sportsbet.io is a sports betting website; therefore these Prediction Contests and Promos are catered to those who actually bet on/discuss sports.Given the nature of my threads, please do not bother making a Prediction if you have not read the OP and qualify.If you are unsure if you qualify, just shoot me a PM.  Thank you for your cooperation.
